County Clare is lighting up today with solid 10 ft @ 13s W swell and fresh 16 mph SSW winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, especially during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 12 ft @ 13s W with fresh 19 mph W winds, making it less favorable. The day after, we see 6 ft @ 10s W with strong 22 mph WNW winds, keeping it poor across the board. Best: today.
